title: Privacy Policy Home
content:
CafeX takes information security very seriously and we follow the Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability (CIA) principles in all of our applications and services.

Data Privacy Framework

Service integrations disclosures – Google Services Integrations

CafeX’s use of information received from Google APIs will adhere to the Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements.

For more information on what information we collect and how we use it please refer to CafeX Privacy Policies.
